Subskills.name: Crippling Shout
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by odin's fury.

Subskills.name: Howling Cry
Subskills.description: Increases the stun duration of odin's fury.

Subskills.name: Warcry
Subskills.description: Odinâ€™s fury now knocks back monsters and if they hit a wall or an object they take extra damage, get stunned and are pulled back to the player.

Subskills.name: Mind Tactics
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of odin's fury.

Subskills.name: Echoing Roar
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of odin's fury.

Subskills.name: Tormenting Shout
Subskills.description: Increases the damage of odin's fury based on your maximum life.

Subskills.name: Roaring Carnage
Subskills.description: Knock up monsters causing them to take damage when they land.

Subskills.name: Echo of Duality
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional shout.

Subskills.name: Shout of the Hunt
Subskills.description: Increases your movement speed for a short period of time after using odin's fury.

Subskills.name: Pulsing Echo
Subskills.description: Now performs an echoing shout pulsating multiple times dealing increased damage with each pulse.

Subskills.name: Trembling Roar
Subskills.description: Gain a buff dealing extra damage to burning and bleeding monsters.
